name: set flow.settings.confidence
Detections filter
Default settings
func:
msg.payload = {
    service: "ObjectDetections",
    aoi: {
        id: "aoi",
        x1: 200,
        y1: 200,
        x2: 800,
        y2: 800
    },
    age: 2,
    distance: 10,
    confidence: 30,
    classes: ["Human", "Car"],
    timeout: 5,
    threshold: 1
}

return msg;

name: Presence counter

Init
Visualization
Validate
Initialize by setting device credentials and click the blue box on the left side of "timestamp"
